messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: On March 23, DET. O. P. Jackson was dispatched after reports of credit card fraud at the Downtown Plaza. Key informants were Mr. Bennett, a bank representative, and Ms. Rogers, a victim of the fraud. FORWARD COPY TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION. INFORMANT DOCS. Lt. Q. R. Smith - OPERATIONS Det. Jackson, Sr. .. INVESTIGATIONS. Detective S. T. Lewis and Detective U. V. Moore were brought in to trace the transactions. CLARK 01:45 Fraud Mr. Bennett provided transaction details, and Ms. Rogers identified unauthorized purchases. Electronic. Technician Nora analyzed transaction logs. CONTINUED FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION 3- STATUS [CHECK ONE] Det. Jackson Sr, Det. Lewis, Det. Moore OPERATIONS Lt. Smith INFORMANT Rogers, Elaine 95 Cedar Street, Downtown, Illinois 201-910. 94315. CLARK 01:45 Fraud By 3:25 AM, Detectives Jackson, Lewis, and Moore, under Lieutenant Smith's supervision, traced the purchases to an online seller. Captain W. X. Peterson advised a collaboration with cyber units. Sergeant Y. Z. Quinn and Sergeant A. B. Ross liaised with the online platform for seller details. By 5:40 AM, the seller's identity was obtained. FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION 3- STATUS [CHECK ONE] Det. Jackson Sr, Det. Lewis, Det. Moore OPERATIONS Lt. Smith AFFIDAVIT - Fraud Report 1) Transaction Records 2) Witness Statements 3) F.I.R. 4) Online Purchase Details 5) Bank Statements (6) Other Details LINE UP INFO ASSISTANT CHIEF DEPUTY IN CHARGE S. Harris D.P.P.D. 32.130 P74 3475 Bennett, MARK NAME: ADDRESS: TELEPHONE: 190-3775 DETECTIVE: O. JACKSON ITEM: 74-5550- 109 CRIME: 01:45 IDENTIFICATION NUMBER 84460 - CONFIRMED John Doe DATE 9/25/24 FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION CONTINUED.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: DET. O. P. Jackson  Officer Context: On March 23, DET. O. P. Jackson was dispatched after reports of credit card fraud at the Downtown Plaza. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Lt. Q. R. Smith  Officer Context: Lt. Q. R. Smith - OPERATIONS Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Detective S. T. Lewis  Officer Context: Detective S. T. Lewis and Detective U. V. Moore were brought in to trace the transactions. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective U. V. Moore  Officer Context: Detective S. T. Lewis and Detective U. V. Moore were brought in to trace the transactions. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Technician Nora  Officer Context: Electronic. Technician Nora analyzed transaction logs. Officer Role: Technician (from the Crime Lab) Officer Name: Detective Jackson  Officer Context: By 3:25 AM, Detectives Jackson, Lewis, and Moore, under Lieutenant Smith's supervision, traced the purchases to an online seller. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective Lewis  Officer Context: By 3:25 AM, Detectives Jackson, Lewis, and Moore, under Lieutenant Smith's supervision, traced the purchases to an online seller. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective Moore  Officer Context: By 3:25 AM, Detectives Jackson, Lewis, and Moore, under Lieutenant Smith's supervision, traced the purchases to an online seller. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Captain W. X. Peterson  Officer Context: Captain W. X. Peterson advised a collaboration with cyber units. Officer Role: Captain Officer Name: Sergeant Y. Z. Quinn  Officer Context: Sergeant Y. Z. Quinn and Sergeant A. B. Ross liaised with the online platform for seller details. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sergeant A. B. Ross Officer Context: Sergeant Y. Z. Quinn and Sergeant A. B. Ross liaised with the online platform for seller details. Officer Role: Sergeant
